scripts.test: npm run test:core && npm run test:app
scripts.hardhat: concurrently "npm exec -w core -- hardhat node --hostname 127.0.0.1" "wait-port 127.0.0.1:8545 && npm exec -w core -- hardhat run scripts/deploy-local.ts --network localhost"
scripts.hardhat:console: npm exec -w core -- hardhat --network localhost console --no-compile
scripts.start: npm run compile && concurrently "npm run node" "npm run app:dev"
scripts.deploy:matic: npm run hardhat run scripts/deploy.ts --network matic -w core
scripts.console:matic: npm run hardhat console --network matic -w core
